DOC.brief_summary: Blue-light-filtering IOLs implant increasingly often cataract surgery . Several study examine effect blue-light-filters contrast colour vision . However , study outcome vary . The present study investigate effect blue-light-filtering IOL colour perception contrast acuity use highly sensitive measurement method .
DOC.criteria: bilateral agerelated cataract age 55 80 year expect postoperative visual acuity least 1.0 amblyopia corneal scar diabetes arterial hypertonia pseudoexfoliationsyndrome earlier ocular surgery laser treatment intraocular tumor color abnormality expect postoperative visual acuity lower 1.0
